document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2007-10
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON ADOPTING BY REFERENCE THE 2007 EDITIONS OF THE CALIFORNIA CODE OF REGULATIONS TITLE 24 AND RELATED MODEL CODES WITH APPENDICES AND AMENDMENTS AS IDENTIFIED HEREIN THROUGH EXPRESS FINDINGS OF LOCAL NECESSITY; REPEALING ORDINANCE 2002-08 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AND ALL OTHER ORDINANCES AND PARTS OF ORDINANCES IN CONFLICT THEREWITH
